gameDetails.name: Quarriors! Rise of the Demons
gameDetails.description: Quarriors!: Rise of the Demons features 20 new custom dice and 19 new cards and combines innovative corruption mechanisms with the introduction of the Demonic Overlord, Basic Corruption Quiddity and Corruption Spells! Attempt to flood your opponent's bags with corrupted dice to slow them down or gather your forces to purchase Demonic Overlords from the Wilds to pave your way to Glory.
